This occurred when starting the STEM RCP via stem.product

Has this reoccurred since 3/21.  I have not seen it and it should perhaps be closed.

This bug happened, and it's still in the code as far as I am aware. It is just one of a number of bugs that are intermittent.  It probably happens because we dispose of something before we should.  I don't know of any major changes to the interface code at this time that would have corrected it as a side-effect.  I expect we can find it with a bit of static analysis.  It's assigned to me, I'll get around to the analysis.
There have been no reports of this bug since major changes to the UI code.  Conclusion, it's gone.
